verbs.description: [ARG0: British Foreign Secretary Boris Johnson] [V: risked] [ARG1: a fresh Brexit row] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [ARGM-TMP: after being secretly recorded predicting a " meltdown " in the negotiations] , [ARGM-ADV: accusing some in the government of blocking the process and implying US President Donald Trump might handle it better] .

British Foreign Secretary Boris Johnson risked a fresh Brexit row on Friday after [V: being] secretly recorded predicting a " meltdown " in the negotiations , accusing some in the government of blocking the process and implying US President Donald Trump might handle it better .
